views.markdown:
Version 4.3v - Background colour and deep blur blend together now - Blur options available now (none, little, normal) - Revamped the colour picker (Hex values are exactly what you type now) Version 4.2 - Fixed Background colour reappearing after being turned off - Deep Blur now better and looks sleeker - Attempt at fixing tweak conflicts Version 4.1 - Handled highlight variants better - Better vision of how nude predictive cells would look - Fixed advertisement in settings - Minor bug fixes Version 4.0
-Compatible with iOS 11
- Improved prediction cell performance (blending two colours only happens once)
- Improved overall performance
- Fixed preferences colour picker
Version 3.1
- Ads can be turned off now (this ensures I am not forcing anyone into participating in a charity)
- fixed littles bugs here and there


Version 3.0
- Color the keyboard text for the best experience

- Cleaner look (perfected the blur, and even the popup key blur)

- No more glitches! (blurs adjust automatically to devices)

- Removed dark keyboard as it was redundant at this point

- Added Advertisement throughout settings, 50% or more earnings from the advertisement will be going to a charity of my choice, follow me on Twitter @Orangebananaspy to know which charity when I donate
Version 2.0
- Fixed respring method
- Cleaned code in setting to avoid crash for initializing too many colour pickers (now it reuses just one)
- License active for everyone!
This item is now Free.
Version 1.1
- iOS 9 Compatible
Version 1.0.3
- Fix more crashing, hopefully its crash free now!

Also a big thanks for the support and couple of receipt of Donation should be up on twitter! (@orangebananaspy)
Version 1.0.2
- Fixes crashes
- Fixes color changes made to environment

Explanation: Crashes occurred due to extending UIColor class to include Hex Colouring which interfered with some applications which also extended UIColor class.
Version 1.0.1
- Compatible with iOS 7, 8, & 9
- Hopefully fixed some crashes
- "Ugly" blue for Search and Done buttons are clear now

Extra Info
- Key background will not work for pirates :p
